item.title: Ownage come back!
item.dc:creator: @ownage_plz ownage plz
item.description:
@ownage_plz wrote:

I tried to add a case, but it's pointless, because clicking an interface is NOT an object.

Rolf o.o … go read up on switch statements. You need to add a case for the button you’re clicking.

Also sendFrame218 is only for showing an interface in the chat bar. It only shows it.

Read full topic

item.title: Ownage come back!
item.dc:creator: @Taylor_John0 Taylor John0
item.description:
@Taylor_John0 wrote:

It’s been killing me.
I added this:

else if(useItemID == 440 && (atObjectID == 2781 || atObjectID == 11666)) { sendFrame164(2400); }
And it works, shows the interface. But ownage plz said it was sendFrame218. But when I do that, and I click the interface, it’s basically not there. Nothing happens upon right click.
I tried to add a case, but it’s pointless, because clicking an interface is NOT an object.

Please help, if you need more info I’m more than happy to provide it.

Read full topic
